actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

official_title: A bill to establish a Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission and for other purposes.
short_title: Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission Act

summary.text: Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission Act - Establishes in the legislative branch a Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission to undertake certain evaluations, and provide recommendations, relating to the collection, reporting, and analysis of foreign intelligence and information.

titles.title: Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission Act
A bill to establish a Foreign Intelligence and Information Commission and for other purposes.
